- Who's there?
- Wendy.

Well, the good news is even

A most trusted icebreaker, so to speak.

But why is that?
Humor eases the situation.
It makes you seem more open and likable.
This trick is also backed by science.
Laughing releases endorphins

On top of that,

your crush could follow

And if you laugh at it,

People tend to like others

Even if it doesn't work,

it does show others your

So don't be nervous to

Number two, remember to say thank you.

Saying thank you is not

it's also a simple way to
tell someone I appreciate you.

As Antonio Damasia, a professor

put it, "Gratitude rewards generosity

and maintains the cycle of
healthy social behavior."

Showing gratitude makes people

and it lets them know you
recognize their efforts.
If you are hanging out with your crush,

tell them, "Thank you
for such a good time!"

Or if they're a good friend
who never feels to listen,

This simple but powerful phrase

bond between you two.
Three, share a little secret.

It is no secret that
everyone can have a secret.

Some are small, like
that embarrassing thing

you did in middle school,
and some are bigger
like the drama that goes on in the family.

Yeah, you could be someone
who likes to keep them
to yourself, and that's okay.

Sometimes sharing some

Sharing a secret with someone

Making it more special and intimate.
This is something that's been known

Research that goes back as far as 1994

Long story short, telling

Number four, give them compliments.
They say compliments are verbal sunshine.
What do you think?

"You have an awesome style."
"That hair-do looks great on you."
Everyone likes to receive such compliments

It's perfectly normal and

Compliments can make your crush

You seem like someone

It's also worth noting
to compliment things

And number five, ask them questions.

This can make your crush like you.
